lores~.c

00001 #include "ext.h"
00002 #include "z_dsp.h"
00003 #include <math.h>
00004 
00005 #define SMOOTHING_VERSION 0
00006 
00007 // the lores object. A low pass controllable with freq and res
00008 
00009 void *lores_class;
00010 
00011 typedef struct _lores
00012 {
00013     t_pxobject l_obj;
00014     float l_freq;           // stored cutoff frequency in Hz
00015     float l_r;              // stored resonance (0-1)
00016     float l_a1;             // computed coefficient
00017     float l_a2;             // computer coefficient
00018     float l_a1p;            // previous computed coefficient
00019     float l_a2p;            // previous computer coefficient
00020     float l_ym1;            // previous output sample
00021     float l_ym2;            // previous to previous output sample
00022     float l_fqterm;         // computed frequency term
00023     float l_resterm;        // computer resonance term
00024     float l_2pidsr;         // stored value of 2 pi over the sampling rate
00025     short l_rcon;           // is a signal connected to the resonance inlet 
00026     short l_fcon;           // is a signal connected to the frequency inlet
00027 } t_lores;
00028 
00029 void lores_dsp(t_lores *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);
00030 t_int *lores_perform(t_int *w);
00031 t_int *lores_perform_unroll(t_int *w);
00032 t_int *lores_perform_unroll_smooth(t_int *w);
00033 void lores_int(t_lores *x, long n);
00034 void lores_float(t_lores *x, double f);
00035 void lores_calc(t_lores *x);
00036 void lores_clear(t_lores *x);
00037 void lores_assist(t_lores *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00038 void *lores_new(double freq, double reso);
00039 
00040 int main(void)
00041 {
00042     setup((t_messlist **)&lores_class,(method)lores_new, (method)dsp_free, 
00043         (short)sizeof(t_lores), 0L, A_DEFFLOAT, A_DEFFLOAT, 0);
00044     addmess((method)lores_dsp, "dsp", A_CANT, 0);
00045     addmess((method)lores_assist, "assist", A_CANT, 0);
00046     addmess((method)lores_clear, "clear", 0);
00047     addint((method)lores_int);
00048     addfloat((method)lores_float);
00049     dsp_initclass();
00050 
00051     return 0;
00052 }
00053 
00054 void lores_dsp(t_lores *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00055 {
00056     x->l_2pidsr = (2. * PI) / sp[0]->s_sr;
00057     lores_calc(x);
00058     x->l_a1p = x->l_a1;     // store prev coefs
00059     x->l_a2p = x->l_a2;
00060     x->l_fcon = count[1];   // signal connected to the frequency inlet?
00061     x->l_rcon = count[2];   // signal connected to the resonance inlet?
00062     lores_clear(x);
00063 
00064     if (sp[0]->s_n >= 4) {
00065 #if SMOOTHING_VERSION
00066         dsp_add(lores_perform_unroll_smooth, 6, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[3]->s_vec, x, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, (sp[0]->s_n/4));
00067 #else
00068         dsp_add(lores_perform_unroll, 6, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[3]->s_vec, x, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, (sp[0]->s_n/4));
00069 #endif
00070     }
00071     else
00072         dsp_add(lores_perform, 6, sp[0]->s_vec, sp[3]->s_vec, x, sp[1]->s_vec, sp[2]->s_vec, sp[0]->s_n);
00073 }
00074 
00075 t_int *lores_perform(t_int *w)
00076 {
00077     // assign from parameters
00078     t_float *in = (t_float *)(w[1]);
00079     t_float *out = (t_float *)(w[2]);
00080     t_lores *x = (t_lores *)(w[3]);
00081     t_float freq = x->l_fcon? *(float *)(w[4]) : x->l_freq;
00082     t_float resonance = x->l_rcon? *(float *)(w[5]) : x->l_r;
00083     int n = (int)(w[6]);
00084     float a1 = x->l_a1,a2 = x->l_a2, ym1 = x->l_ym1, ym2 = x->l_ym2;
00085     float val,scale,temp,resterm;
00086     
00087     if (x->l_obj.z_disabled)
00088         goto out;
00089         
00090     // constrain resonance value
00091     
00092     if (resonance >= 1.)
00093         resonance = 1. - 1E-20;
00094     else if (resonance < 0.)
00095         resonance = 0.;
00096     
00097     // do we need to recompute coefficients?
00098     
00099     if (freq != x->l_freq || resonance != x->l_r) {
00100         if (resonance != x->l_r)
00101             resterm = x->l_resterm = exp(resonance * 0.125) * .882497;
00102         else
00103             resterm = x->l_resterm;
00104         if (freq != x->l_freq)
00105             x->l_fqterm = cos(x->l_2pidsr * freq);
00106         x->l_a1 = a1 = -2. * resterm * x->l_fqterm;
00107         x->l_a2 = a2 = resterm * resterm;
00108         x->l_r = resonance;
00109         x->l_freq = freq;
00110     }
00111     
00112     scale = 1. + a1 + a2;
00113     
00114     // DSP loop
00115     
00116     while (n--) {
00117         val = *in++;
00118         temp = ym1;
00119         ym1 = scale * val - a1 * ym1 - a2 * ym2;
00120 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00121         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(ym1)) ym1 = temp = 0;
00122 #endif
00123         ym2 = temp;
00124         *out++ = ym1;
00125     }
00126     x->l_ym1 = ym1;
00127     x->l_ym2 = ym2;
00128 out:
00129     return (w+7);
00130 }
00131 
00132 t_int *lores_perform_unroll(t_int *w)
00133 {
00134     // assign from parameters
00135     t_float *in = (t_float *)(w[1]);
00136     t_float *out = (t_float *)(w[2]);
00137     t_lores *x = (t_lores *)(w[3]);
00138     t_float freq = x->l_fcon? *(float *)(w[4]) : x->l_freq;
00139     t_float resonance = x->l_rcon? *(float *)(w[5]) : x->l_r;
00140     int n = (int)(w[6]); // n=VS/4+1
00141     float a1 = x->l_a1,a2 = x->l_a2;
00142     
00143     float yna = x->l_ym2, ynb = x->l_ym1;
00144     float val,scale,resterm;
00145     
00146     if (x->l_obj.z_disabled)
00147         goto out;
00148         
00149     // constrain resonance value
00150     
00151     if (resonance >= 1.)
00152         resonance = 1. - 1E-20;
00153     else if (resonance < 0.)
00154         resonance = 0.;
00155     
00156     // do we need to recompute coefficients?
00157     
00158     if (freq != x->l_freq || resonance != x->l_r) {
00159         if (resonance != x->l_r)
00160             resterm = x->l_resterm = exp(resonance * 0.125) * .882497;
00161         else
00162             resterm = x->l_resterm;
00163         if (freq != x->l_freq)
00164             x->l_fqterm = cos(x->l_2pidsr * freq);
00165         x->l_a1 = a1 = -2. * resterm * x->l_fqterm;
00166         x->l_a2 = a2 = resterm * resterm;
00167         x->l_r = resonance;
00168         x->l_freq = freq;
00169     }
00170     
00171     scale = 1. + a1 + a2;
00172     
00173     while (n--) { //n=VS/4
00174         *out++ = yna = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * ynb - a2 * yna;
00175 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00176         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(yna)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00177 #endif
00178         *out++ = ynb = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * yna - a2 * ynb;
00179 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00180         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(ynb)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00181 #endif
00182         *out++ = yna = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * ynb - a2 * yna;
00183 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00184         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(yna)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00185 #endif
00186         *out++ = ynb = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * yna - a2 * ynb;
00187 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00188         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(ynb)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00189 #endif
00190     }
00191     x->l_ym1 = ynb;
00192     x->l_ym2 = yna;
00193 out:
00194     return (w+7);
00195 }
00196 
00197 t_int *lores_perform_unroll_smooth(t_int *w)
00198 {
00199     // assign from parameters
00200     t_float *in = (t_float *)(w[1]);
00201     t_float *out = (t_float *)(w[2]);
00202     t_lores *x = (t_lores *)(w[3]);
00203     t_float freq = x->l_fcon? *(float *)(w[4]) : x->l_freq;
00204     t_float resonance = x->l_rcon? *(float *)(w[5]) : x->l_r;
00205     int n = (int)(w[6]); // vs/4
00206     float a1 = x->l_a1,a2 = x->l_a2;
00207     
00208     float yna = x->l_ym2, ynb = x->l_ym1;
00209     float val,scale, scalep, scalei,resterm;
00210     
00211     float mult, a1i, a2i;
00212     
00213     if (x->l_obj.z_disabled)
00214         goto out;
00215         
00216     // constrain resonance value
00217     
00218     if (resonance >= 1.)
00219         resonance = 1. - 1E-20;
00220     else if (resonance < 0.)
00221         resonance = 0.;
00222     
00223     // do we need to recompute coefficients?
00224     
00225     if (freq != x->l_freq || resonance != x->l_r) {
00226         if (resonance != x->l_r)
00227             resterm = x->l_resterm = exp(resonance * 0.125) * .882497;
00228         else
00229             resterm = x->l_resterm;
00230         if (freq != x->l_freq)
00231             x->l_fqterm = cos(x->l_2pidsr * freq);
00232         x->l_a1 = a1 = -2. * resterm * x->l_fqterm;
00233         x->l_a2 = a2 = resterm * resterm;
00234         x->l_r = resonance;
00235         x->l_freq = freq;
00236     }
00237     
00238     a1 = x->l_a1p;
00239     a2 = x->l_a2p;
00240     
00241     scalep = 1. + a1 + a2;
00242     scale = 1. + x->l_a1 + x->l_a2;
00243     
00244     mult = 0.25/n; // 0.25 because n = vs/4
00245     a1i = (x->l_a1-a1) * mult;
00246     a2i = (x->l_a2-a2) * mult;
00247     scalei = (scale-scalep) * mult;
00248     
00249     while (n--) { //n=VS/4
00250         scale+=scalei; a1+=a1i; a2+=a2i;
00251         *out++ = yna = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * ynb - a2 * yna;
00252 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00253         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(yna)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00254 #endif
00255         scale+=scalei; a1+=a1i; a2+=a2i;
00256         *out++ = ynb = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * yna - a2 * ynb;
00257 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00258         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(ynb)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00259 #endif
00260         scale+=scalei; a1+=a1i; a2+=a2i;
00261         *out++ = yna = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * ynb - a2 * yna;
00262 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00263         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(yna)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00264 #endif
00265         scale+=scalei; a1+=a1i; a2+=a2i;
00266         *out++ = ynb = scale * (val = *in++) - a1 * yna - a2 * ynb;
00267 #ifdef DENORM_WANT_FIX
00268         if (IS_DENORM_NAN_FLOAT(ynb)) yna = ynb = *out = 0;
00269 #endif
00270     }
00271     x->l_ym1 = ynb;
00272     x->l_ym2 = yna;
00273     
00274     // store prev coefs
00275     x->l_a1p = x->l_a1;
00276     x->l_a2p = x->l_a2;
00277     
00278 out:
00279     return (w+7);
00280 }
00281 
00282 void lores_int(t_lores *x, long n)
00283 {
00284     lores_float(x,(double)n);
00285 }
00286 
00287 void lores_float(t_lores *x, double f)
00288 {
00289     long in = proxy_getinlet((t_object *)x);
00290     
00291     if (in == 1) {
00292         x->l_freq = f;
00293         lores_calc(x);
00294     } else if (in == 2) {
00295         x->l_r = f >= 1.0 ? 1 - 1E-20 : f;
00296         lores_calc(x);
00297     }
00298 }
00299 
00300 void lores_clear(t_lores *x)
00301 {
00302     x->l_ym1 = x->l_ym2 = 0.;       // clear sample memory to recover from blowup
00303 }
00304 
00305 void lores_calc(t_lores *x)
00306 {
00307     float resterm;
00308     
00309     // calculate filter coefficients from frequency and resonance
00310     
00311     resterm = exp(x->l_r * 0.125) * 0.882497;
00312     x->l_fqterm = cos(x->l_2pidsr * x->l_freq);
00313     x->l_a1 = -2. * resterm * x->l_fqterm;
00314     x->l_a2 = resterm * resterm;
00315     x->l_resterm = resterm;
00316 }
00317 
00318 void lores_assist(t_lores *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00319 {
00320     if (m == 2)
00321         sprintf(s,"(signal) Output");
00322     else {
00323         switch (a) {    
00324         case 0: sprintf(s,"(signal) Input"); break;
00325         case 1: sprintf(s,"(signal/float) Cutoff Frequency"); break;
00326         case 2: sprintf(s,"(signal/float) Resonance Control (0-1)"); break;
00327         }
00328     }
00329 }
00330 
00331 void *lores_new(double val, double reso)
00332 {
00333     t_lores *x = (t_lores *)newobject(lores_class);
00334     dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x,3);
00335 
00336     // three signal inlets
00337     
00338     x->l_freq = val;
00339     x->l_r = reso >= 1.0 ? 1. - 1E-20 : reso;
00340     x->l_2pidsr = (2. * PI) / sys_getsr();
00341     lores_calc(x);
00342     
00343     x->l_a1p = x->l_a1;
00344     x->l_a2p = x->l_a2;
00345     
00346     // one signal outlet
00347     
00348     outlet_new((t_object *)x, "signal");
00349     
00350     return (x);
00351 }
